item.title: [Spain][VOIP] - Interconnect
item.description:
Apr 6, 09:30 UTC
Identified - Start time : 2022/03/28 16:03 UTC
Service impact : Folowing this incident Incident link we now have an issue with some Spanish numbers. They end up with an Unassigned number error.
There are a number of numbers that cannot be reached. This is not related to a signaling defect but to a routing defect of some operators to these numbers.
Ongoing actions : We have opened tickets with 2 operators to correct the problem.
Unfortunately the main protagonist Telefonica complicates things and does not respond willingly to the problems reported. We will get back to you with updates soon

item.title: [France][Over the box] - Upgrade campaign
item.description:
Apr 4, 09:23 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Feb 8, 10:15 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Jan 19, 21:06 UTC
Scheduled - Start time :08/02/2022 10:15 UTC
End time :04/04/2022 09:15 UTC
Service impact : Short downtime while upgrading system
Service improvement : A few month back, we introduce a new version of our provisionning backend, which is used to setup remote actions on the overthebox device. The previous version is deprecated and existing overthebox need to be migrated toversion v0.6.33. We are planning to start to migrate customer on support level standard from February 8, and Premium customer from February 28.
End of migrations is planned for April 4.

If you wish to upgrade the device on your own, you can follow this guide : https://docs.ovh.com/fr/overthebox/config-upgrade/

item.title: [13][Internet Access] - xDSL/FTTH services
item.description:
Mar 31, 09:12 UTC
Resolved - The intervention was successfully completed last night at 16:00 UTC

Start time : 30/03/2022 06:00 UTC
End time : 31/03/2022 16:00 UTC

Mar 31, 07:50 UTC
Monitoring - Our teams contacted the infrastructure operator responsible for the operation. We are not seeing any impact at this time. This operation follows an incident of cut of optical fiber. A temporary solution had been put in place. A final repair intervention is carried out and is the cause of the disruptions encountered

Mar 30, 16:02 UTC
Update - Ongoing actions : Our teams are still working on the issue.
We apologize for the inconvenience caused and thank you for your understanding.

Mar 30, 10:56 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 30/03/2022 06:00 UTC
Service impact : We would like to inform you that an temporary solution has been deployed. The soldering has started. A new intervention will be necessary, this day. However, the services may be impacted, until the final restoration.

item.title: [P19][VoIP] - Telephony
item.description:
Mar 30, 22:38 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 29/03/2022 08:00 UTC
End Time : 30/03/2022 13:07 UTC
Service impact : The supervision service (BLF) is once again operational on the A infrastructure. The migration operations carried out by our team have allowed to perpetuate the resolution by reducing the load on the machine.
Root cause : An overload was the root cause of this issue.
Current status : Resolved

Mar 30, 12:56 UTC
Monitoring - Migration operations are underway. We do not observe any more alarms for the moment and services are going up.
We are monitoring the evolution of the situation

Mar 30, 09:44 UTC
Update - Ongoing actions : To improve the load distribution of our supervision infrastructure, we migrate services to other infrastructures

We apologise for any inconveniency caused.

Mar 30, 09:27 UTC
Update - Ongoing actions: Our teams are making a robot to do the migration. The purpose of rebot is to correct the load problem we have.

Mar 29, 16:14 UTC
Update - Update : Our team is planning a migration tonight to restore the service. We will keep you informed of the progress.

Mar 29, 14:07 UTC
Identified - Start time : 29/03/2022 08:00 UTC
Service impact : The supervision service (BLF) is degraded on infrastructure A due to an overload.
Root cause : An overload is the cause of this issue
Ongoing actions : A patch is currently being deployed to smooth the load on the machine.

Mar 29, 12:23 UTC
Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue.

Mar 29, 10:29 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 29/03/2022 08:00 UTC
Service impact : The supervision service (BLF) is degraded on infrastructure A due to an overload.
Ongoing actions : Our teams are currently working to solve the problem.
